content: **Celestial Jade Lotus Pills** are items that you can collect in Black Myth: Wukong to increase your maximum HP. Every hit counts in Black Myth: Wukong, and having less health to burn through can easily be the difference between life and death. Here, we will cover the locations of all Celestial Jade Lotus Pills so you can have as much HP as possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Jade_Lotus_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Jade Lotus Pill Locations'.
The content is as follows:
**Celestial Jade Lotus Pills** are items that you can collect in Black Myth: Wukong to increase your maximum HP. Every hit counts in Black Myth: Wukong, and having less health to burn through can easily be the difference between life and death. Here, we will cover the locations of all Celestial Jade Lotus Pills so you can have as much HP as possible.
